title: Skills
html-description: Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.
css-description: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML.
javascript-description: JavaScript, often abbreviated as JS, is a programming language that conforms to the ECMAScript specification.
react-description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It is maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies.
sass-description: Sass is an extension of CSS, adding additional features like variables, nesting, mixins, and more.
typescript-description: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.
express-description: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.
flask-description: Flask is a microframework for Python based on Werkzeug, Jinja 2 and good intentions.
mongodb-description: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program.
nodejs-description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's JavaScript V8 engine.
python-description: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Recently considered for the development of applications that have artificial intelligence.
bootstrap-description: Bootstrap is an open source framework for developing websites and web applications.
redis-description: Redis is an in-memory database that persists data in the form of key-value pairs.
mysql-description: MySQL is an open source relational database management system.
git-description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.
graphql-description: GraphQL is a query language for your API. It lets you fetch and integrate data from a variety of sources.
bash-description: Bash is a Unix shell and command language.
github-actions-description: GitHub Actions is a continuous integration service for GitHub.
docker-description: Docker is an open source project to package up and run applications in containers.
nginx-description: Nginx is an HTTP and reverse proxy server.
